member.name: F:TypTop.JumpMinigame.JumpGame.JumpHeight
member.summary: Maximum height the player can jump.

member.name: P:TypTop.JumpMinigame.JumpGame.LaneAmount
member.summary: Amount of lanes that should be used for this level. Minimum amount of unique words must be equal to this value.

member.name: P:TypTop.JumpMinigame.JumpGame.LaneWidth
member.summary: Width that the lanes should have.

member.name: P:TypTop.JumpMinigame.JumpGame.EnemySpawnHeight
member.summary: Minimal height of an enemy to spawn. Default is after one screen height.

member.name: P:TypTop.JumpMinigame.JumpGame.EnemyAmount
member.summary: Amount of enemies to spawn per 100 platforms.

member.name: T:TypTop.JumpMinigame.JumpGame.EnemyType
member.summary: All possible ways an enemy can move.

member.name: P:TypTop.JumpMinigame.JumpGame.PlatformBreakAmount
member.summary: Amount of jumps the player can make on a platform until it breaks. 0 will instantly break.

member.name: P:TypTop.JumpMinigame.JumpGame.PlatformBreakOffset
member.summary: Offset when generating random Platform break amounts.

member.name: P:TypTop.JumpMinigame.JumpGame.PlatformSolidRatio
member.summary: Percentage solid platforms. Default is solid platforms only.

member.name: P:TypTop.JumpMinigame.JumpGame.SwitchWords
member.summary: Switch words when the word was typed correctly.

member.name: P:TypTop.JumpMinigame.JumpGame.SaveJump
member.summary: Save the players jump when their timing is not accurate.

member.name: M:TypTop.JumpMinigame.JumpGame.GeneratePlatforms(System.Boolean,System.Single)
member.summary: Generate platforms for the player to jump on
member.param: Indicates of a starting platform should be drawn.
The estimated distance that is gerenated. Due to random occurences, it is typically rendered lower than the set difference. Do not go lower than the jumpheight.

member.name: M:TypTop.JumpMinigame.JumpGame.CheckGeneratePlatforms
member.summary: Checks if platforms should be generated.

member.name: P:TypTop.JumpMinigame.Player.Lane
member.summary: Current lane the player is jumping in.
